nodes.text: A Toydarian clan bell was an item possessed by Toydarians of noble lineage. Watto purchased one and set it in the top of his shop's personal resting nest. Watto's bell was cone-shaped and decorated with a frieze of glyphs.

While Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I stated that Watto only purchased his clan bell, implying that he was not truly of high lineage, the 17th issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File called it a symbol of Watto's clan.
